title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out
overview: Ed Stafford takes on a series of head-to-head challenges against some of the biggest names in survival, risking life, limb, and reputation along the way. Over miles of hostile terrain in Asia, Ed and his opponents will face high stakes survival challenges as they race to reach a pre-determined extraction point, in a bid to prove they are top of their game and be the first man out.
